resources.string: Set color to FAB and other small UI elements
Archive files will be extracted to this folder. Default value is the directory in which archive is present
This is an archive. What action would you like to perform?
Enables custom back navigation at top of the list

- Fixed cut/paste
- Fixed text editor for root
- Added German, French, Italian, Russian and Chinese languages
- Added bookmarks to navigation drawer
- Added material dialogs
- more...

- Added Spanish
- Various Zip Viewer fixes
- Can view apk and jar files
- Various text editor fixes
- more...

- Swipable tabs
- Fully revamped UI
- Speedy copy/paste/extract/compress operations
- Progress of operations in notifications
- Fixes for zip viewer and text editor
- Ability to uninstall system apps
- Improved searching of files
- Serbian,basque translations
- Added preference to disable go back list header
- Added preference to disable circular thumbnails
- Added preference to choose archive extract and compress directory
- Added preference to remember paths
- more...

- Implemented Database viewer
- Implemented rar viewer
- Improved notifications for operations
- Fixed drawer closing lag and improve layout
- New circular icon
- Introduced swipe(pull) to refresh
- Added recognition of usb drive for some devices
- Colored navigation bar for lollipop devices
- Ripple effect for lollipop devices
- Many UI improvements
- Many Bug fixes
- more...

- Redesigned UI as per material design guidelines
- New icon and graphics by CookIcons.co
- Improved animations for smoother experience
- Added custom primary, accent and icon colors to make UI dynamic
- Added headers and dividers in the list
- Drawer can now sync the G+ profile pic and cover pic
- Light and Dark themes are improved, looks more beautiful now!
- Removed Bookmark Manager from drawer, long click on Bookmark instead
- You can now enable toolbar hiding or app bar hiding as you scroll
- Lots of performance and bug fixes
- Many translation fixes
- more...

- Sort options for apps list
- Improved tab UI and drawer header
- Introducing lollipop external storage write access

- Fixed fab for tablets
- Fixed Color settings
- New materialized fab

v2.0.8
- Fixed file sharing
- New faster method for file searching

v2.0.7b
- Minor bugfixes

v2.0.7
- Minor fix for shortcuts
- Minor fix for root file deletion
- Improved Dialogs
(Now \'Hidden Items\' in menu will only be visible if \"Show hidden Files\" preference is enabled in settings)- Sort options for apps list

- Implemented windows(smb) file sharing
- Faster and better file sharing
- Added list animations
- Number of files and folders are shown instead of used space
- GridView can now adjust number of columns on its own even on rotation(Experimental)
- Separate Properties button for each file in landscape mode and for tablets
- New Fab
- Improved structure of drawer
- New shortcuts in drawer to load all media files(Images,Audio,Videos,Apks,Docs)
- Updated Translations
- Many Bug Fixes
